alert.note: Alert for Eastern Franklin; Eastern Hampden; Eastern Hampshire; Western Franklin; Western Hampden; Western Hampshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 11 at 3:19AM EST until December 12 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches, highest amounts in the Berkshires into western Hartford county. * WHERE...Portions of northern Connecticut and western Massachusetts. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 7 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions due to snow covered roads. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snow will be late afternoon into this evening when snowfall rates may briefly approach 1 inch per hour. The snow will taper off after midnight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Franklin; Eastern Hampden; Eastern Hampshire; Western Franklin; Western Hampden; Western Hampshire
